title: Sometimes One Finds an Old Reminiscing Flask, Whence Issues in Full Life a Returning Soul (Parfois on trouve un vieux flacon qui se souvient, d'où jaillit toute vive une âme qui revient) from The Flowers of Evil (Les Fleurs du mal)
medium: One from a portfolio of nine photogravures (including cover)
credits: Gift of The Ian Woodner Family Collection
